name: Vegan Pumpkin Muffins
description: These vegan pumpkin muffins are super soft, perfectly sweet, moist, and tender. And they're packed with delicious pumpkin spice flavors, which makes them perfect for fall. The perfect way to start your day!

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the dry ingredients (all-purpose flour, brown sugar, baking powder, salt, and spices). Stir until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine the dry ingredients (all-purpose flour, brown sugar, baking powder, salt, and spices). Stir until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the pumpkin puree, the apple sauce, the olive oil, and the almond milk. Stir until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the pumpkin puree, the apple sauce, the olive oil, and the almond milk. Stir until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Line a muffin pan with 12 paper liners and equally divide the batter. Preheat the oven to 350 °F.
recipeInstructions.name: Line a muffin pan with 12 paper liners and equally divide the batter. Preheat the oven to 350 °F.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake the muffins for 18-20 minutes. Do a toothpick test to see if the muffins are done.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake the muffins for 18-20 minutes. Do a toothpick test to see if the muffins are done.
